channel.title: Why dont we use this instead of xAuth
channel.description:
It seems that xAuth will never be properly updated/fixed, so i think we should start looking in a different direction.
This plugin i came across is called AuthMe, it seems to have the same features as xAuth (and even more)
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-authme-v2-5-1-high-performance-authorization-plugin-1818-1-1-r1.22139/
Would be nice if someone could test out this plugin to see if its a good replacement for xAuth

item.title: Why dont we use this instead of xAuth
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yes, we’ll probably ditch Multi-Inv the plugin because Multiverse is incorporating their own multiinv system into it. So we’ll have to use one less plugin to achieve the two separate invs.

MITB is talking about multi-inv the plugin, not ditching multi-inv in Moparcraft.

Read full topic
item.source: Why dont we use this instead of xAuth

item.title: Why dont we use this instead of xAuth
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

he said so we dont have to have seperate inventory. not basing for my answer but as support, why would he say that we can keep separate inv, when we already have it?

MoparCraft Community Minecraft Server [1.2.5 Bukkit]

We will update to 1.1 or whatever the latest is soon, probably a day or two, whenever the rest of the plugins get updated. The good news is we now need one less plugin, Multiverse started a new inventory plugin of their own, so we can ditch Multi-Inv.

see? ditch multi inv!

MoparCraft Community Minecraft Server [1.2.5 Bukkit]

Multiverse started a new inventory plugin of their own, so we can ditch Multi-Inv.

Read full topic

he found this thing for miltiverse inventory to where we have 1 uniform inventory in all worlds instead of mulitple when we update from what i read

item.title: Why dont we use this instead of xAuth
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

omgilikepie:

Actually, xAuth has been updated already, it’s updated to 1.1 now, this time we are waiting for the other plugins to be updated to 1.1

What else do we need besides xAuth, multiworld and LWC? There are plenty of regional plugins out there.

Read full topic

item.title: Why dont we use this instead of xAuth
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Tom_BETA:

Wait, I thought xAuth was updated/fixed already?

Apparently not, since i havent heard anything else from mitb investigating the fixes - and the server hasnt been updated.

And if it takes this long to fix xAuth, given its even been fixed, after every update from now on, well thats going to get old.

Read full topic
